abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews premiere of Eli Keszler composition as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors festival, Mostly Mozart Festival Orchestra concert at David Geffen Hall and performance by clarinetist Martin Frost and pianist Roland Pontinen as part of Mostly Mozart Festival's A Little Night Music series at Stanley H Kaplan Penthouse.

keywords.value: Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A recent evening at the festival included three contrasting programs presented in different locations at Lincoln Center.
snippet: A recent evening at the festival included three contrasting programs presented in different locations at Lincoln Center....

headline.main: Review: A Mostly Mozart Milestone, and an Immersive Lineup
headline.print_headline: Honoring a Musical Milestone With an Immersive Lineup
